name: Becca Parker
desc: “Hey guys! My name is Becca and I’m the owner of Lift Studios. I am also a stylist at Lift specializing in accentuating natural colors to look their best! I love our community so much and I can’t thank you enough for all of your continued support”

name: Marianna Allen
desc: “Hey yall I’m Mari and I have been at Lift for a year and a half! I love doing all things color, extensions, and styling! I love meeting everyone and hope to see you in my chair soon!”

name: Julia Garrett
desc: “Hi everyone my name is Julia Garrett & I do permanent jewelry + social media here at Lift! I love getting to provide jewelry to our customers that is lasting, classy, and unique to each person!”

name: Alicia Allen
desc: “Hey y’all! My name is Alicia Allen, I’m the Lash Tech and Event Makeup Artist at Lift Studios! I’m certified in both Eyelash Extensions and Lash Lift & Tints! My specialties are Hybrid lash extensions, and bridal glam!”

name: Kaeland Waddell
desc: “Hello peeps! ✨ My name is Kaeland and I am a hairstylist at LIFT! I love anything hair related but my passion is coloring and making people feel their best!”

name: Abbie Lee
desc: “Hey y’all! I am Abbie Lee and I am a hairstylist here at Lift Studios! I can do a little bit of everything! I am partial to my blondies, but I love a challenge when it comes to specialty colors!”
